Package org.academiadecodigo.javabank.domain.account

Class SavingsAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.academiadecodigo.javabank.domain.account.Account
      • org.academiadecodigo.javabank.domain.account.SavingsAccount
  • public class SavingsAccount
extends Account
    A savings account domain entity which requires a minimum balance and can only be used for transferring money, not for debiting
    See Also:
    Account, AccountType.SAVINGS
